preliminaryPlanning.title: Preliminary Planning
preliminaryPlanning.description: Organize certificate renewals and training needs through intelligent employee grouping and planning

certificateExpiry.title: Certificate Expiry Analysis
certificateExpiry.description: Monitor employee certificate expiry status and renewal requirements

employeeGrouping.title: Employee Grouping
employeeGrouping.description: Create intelligent groups of employees for efficient training planning

planningCalendar.title: Planning Calendar
planningCalendar.description: View preliminary plans in a calendar format

emptyState.noPlans: No preliminary plans for this period
emptyState.description: Plans will appear here when their planning period overlaps with the selected timeframe

create.title: Create New Preliminary Plan
create.description: Create a new preliminary plan to organize certificate renewals and employee training needs.

edit.title: Edit Preliminary Plan
edit.description: Update the preliminary planning details below.

fields.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the scope and objectives of this preliminary plan...
fields.notesPlaceholder: Additional notes or comments about this plan...

validation.requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
validation.invalidDateRange: End date must be after start date

dialog.title: Convert to Definitive Training
dialog.description: Convert this preliminary plan to definitive trainings. This will create actual training sessions in the training scheduler.
dialog.notApprovedDescription: This plan must be approved before it can be converted to definitive trainings.
dialog.skipEmptyGroupsDescription: Only create trainings for groups that have participants assigned
dialog.importantDescription: This action cannot be undone. Once converted, the preliminary plan will be finalized and trainings will be created in the system.

success.title: Plan Successfully Converted
success.description: {{count}} training sessions have been created in the training scheduler.

error.title: Conversion Failed
error.description: There was an error converting the plan. Please try again.
